channel.title: CVE Feed for webtoffee -- Export and Import Users and Customers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webtoffee -- Export and Import Users and Customers

item.title: CVE-2023-3459|2024-10-16T18:57:21.392Z -- webtoffee -- export%20and%20import%20users%20and%20customers
item.description: The Export and Import Users and Customers plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'hf_update_customer' function called via an AJAX action in versions up to, and including, 2.4.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with shop manager-level permissions to change user passwords and potentially take over administrator accounts.
